revised_prompt: Generate a clean, professional banner advertisement with the dimensions of 1200x628 pixels. The advertising banner is for 'TechStore's' Black Friday Sale and utilizes a modern, simple, and uncluttered design. Typography should be in sans-serif fonts with high contrast for legibility. The color scheme should be vibrant and eye-catching, yet the background must be clean or subtle, to not interfere with text readability. Text hierarchy is as follows: The brand name 'TechStore' should be the boldest, largest element at the top or center. The main message 'Up to 70% Off' should be clear, readable, and of medium size, placed in the center area. The call-to-action 'Shop Now' should be prominent, located at the button, bottom or prominent position, with bright colors making it stand out.
